医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
活过 100 岁：健康的习惯、良好的陪伴和人生目标研究人员探索预期寿命延长背后的秘密，重点关注饮食、生活方式和社会经济变化的影响。百岁老人，即活过 100 岁的人，通常会延迟与年龄相关的症状，这表明强调均衡饮食、社交互动和定期锻炼的生活方式可以显着延长寿命和恢复能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Living-past-100-Healthy-habits-good-company-and-a- Purpose-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Living-past-100-Healthy-habits-good-company-and-a- Purpose-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b13e4cd-0b1b-49ef-bfd0-d5cf1ddadb4a Tue, 10 Oct 2023 21:23:00 -0400 Living past 100: Healthy habits, good company, and a purpose in life
研究揭示了免疫细胞在脂肪组织炎症和肥胖中的作用尽管脂肪组织受到了很多谩骂，但它是一种极其复杂且重要的身体器官，参与能量储存和激素产生等功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Study-sheds-light-on-the-role-of-immune-cells-in-fat-tissue-inflammation-and-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Study-sheds-light-on-the-role-of-immune-cells-in-fat-tissue-inflammation-and-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=509b4a1a-2d89-42f9-99d4-f388a7e5d154 Tue, 10 Oct 2023 21:07:00 -0400 Study sheds light on the role of immune cells in fat tissue inflammation and obesity
全球食品贸易改善饮食，但红肉进口引发健康担忧在《自然食品》杂志上发表的一项研究中，研究人员利用 2019 年的数据分析了全球食品贸易对健康的影响。虽然水果和蔬菜等食品的国际贸易降低了许多国家与饮食相关的死亡率，但红肉贸易的增加对健康产生了不利影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Global-food-trade-improves-diets-but-red-meat-imports-raise-health-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Global-food-trade-improves-diets-but-red-meat-imports-raise-health-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7c573ef-e0a7-45fc-afb7-6ea7643e403c Tue, 10 Oct 2023 21:03:00 -0400 Global food trade improves diets but red meat imports raise health concerns
研究发现，非黑色素瘤皮肤癌导致的全球死亡人数高于黑色素瘤今天在 2023 年欧洲皮肤病学和性病学会 (EADV) 大会上发表的一项新研究发现，非黑色素瘤皮肤癌 (NMSC) 导致的全球死亡人数比黑色素瘤（更严重的皮肤癌）还要多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Non-melanoma-skin-cancer-causing-greater-number-of-global-deaths-than-melanoma-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Non-melanoma-skin-cancer-causing-greater-number-of-global-deaths-than-melanoma-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6717fcb1-1c12-4c3f-aaac-031c78e5d528 Tue, 10 Oct 2023 20:59:56 -0400 Non-melanoma skin cancer causing greater number of global deaths than melanoma, study finds
研究支持三分之一的病例存在慢性区域疼痛综合征的遗传倾向基因可能是造成复杂区域疼痛综合征病例的三分之一的原因。但研究人员表示，这种情况在男性中不太常见，尽管他们更有可能携带与高风险相关的 4 种遗传变异，这表明可能存在性别特异性的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Study-supports-genic-predisposition-to-chronic-regional-pain-syndrome-in-a-third-of-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Study-supports-genic-predisposition-to-chronic-regional-pain-syndrome-in-a-third-of-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2050745-a0f5-42a3-a16b-f0efc379ab49 Tue, 10 Oct 2023 20:56:47 -0400 Study supports genetic predisposition to chronic regional pain syndrome in a third of cases
DNA 适体：再生医学及其他领域的多功能工具从诱导多能干细胞和胚胎干细胞产生特定的细胞谱系是再生医学的圣杯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/DNA-aptamers-A-versatile-tool-for-rogenic-medicine-and-beyond.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/DNA-aptamers-A-versatile-tool-for-rogenic-medicine-and-beyond.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22e978dc-52b6-41c8-ae3f-c71104de1bfc Tue, 10 Oct 2023 20:46:49 -0400 DNA aptamers: A versatile tool for regenerative medicine and beyond
推迟儿童 ACL 手术会增加新膝关节损伤的风险约翰·霍普金斯儿童中心对病历的一项研究得出的结论是，延迟对某些儿童的前十字韧带 (ACL) 进行手术治疗会导致韧带初次受伤后半月板和软骨出现新撕裂的风险更高，这有助于将大腿骨连接到胫骨。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Delaying-ACL-surgery-in-children-linked-to-higher-risk-of-new-knee-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Delaying-ACL-surgery-in-children-linked-to-higher-risk-of-new-knee-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38c9322a-3f67-4fb6-a286-348105dc9998 Tue, 10 Oct 2023 20:26:45 -0400 Delaying ACL surgery in children linked to higher risk of new knee injuries
压力引起的核糖体失调可能是抑郁症的根源一组核糖体蛋白基因将抑郁症动物模型与患有重度抑郁症的人类患者联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Stress-induced-ribosome-dysregulation-may-underlie-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Stress-induced-ribosome-dysregulation-may-underlie-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3511727-4dad-4dd1-b33f-c91e8f7c1edb Tue, 10 Oct 2023 20:22:12 -0400 Stress-induced ribosome dysregulation may underlie depression
黑苦莓（Aronia melanocarpa）对糖尿病的益处：希望还是炒作？研究人员比较了发酵和非发酵黑果野樱莓浆果对 2 型糖尿病患者血糖指标的影响。尽管浆果具有很高的抗氧化潜力，并且过去的研究表明其有益，但这项严格的试验发现浆果对腰围、胰岛素敏感性或血糖水平没有显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Black-Chokeberry-(Aronia-melanocarpa)-diabetes-benefits-Hope-or-hype.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Black-Chokeberry-(Aronia-melanocarpa)-diabetes-benefits-Hope-or-hype.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ed7b5c7-f7c2-4b52-a1f0-5db539057b6f Tue, 10 Oct 2023 20:22:00 -0400 Black Chokeberry (Aronia melanocarpa) diabetes benefits: Hope or hype?
怀孕前或怀孕期间的肥胖可能是未来心血管疾病的根本原因最近发现，先兆子痫和妊娠糖尿病等妊娠并发症与以后患心脏病的较高风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Obesity-before-or-during-pregnancy-can-be-the-root-cause-of-future-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Obesity-before-or-during-pregnancy-can-be-the-root-cause-of-future-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e957c66-d93f-4fc2-b87e-347e18283ff4 Tue, 10 Oct 2023 20:14:03 -0400 Obesity before or during pregnancy can be the root cause of future cardiovascular disease
